rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0001
rows.name:
Wooow!
This is incredible,
absolutely incredible!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0002
rows.name:
Look at this!
What an amazing panoramic view!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0003
rows.name:
Ibuki never seen
such a magnificent
view before in my life!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0004
rows.name:
I'm glad you're enjoying it.
However, if I recall...

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0005
rows.name:
Didn't you just get excited about
a similar view not too long ago?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0006
rows.name:
Didn't you get excited about
a similar view just recently?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0007
rows.name:
I believe you were quite pleased with
a similar view just recently,
were you not?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0008
rows.name:
Ya got all excited 'bout
a similar view before, didn't ya?!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0009
rows.name:
Huh?
Did I really?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0010
rows.name:
Hmm, let me think...
...I don't recall that?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0011
rows.name: Are you sure you're not mistaken?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0012
rows.name:
...Well, anyway, that's what makes
adventuring so great! All these
amazing discoveries, one after another!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0013
rows.name:
I want to visit more and more places
and make even more discoveries!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0014
rows.name: Say, Ibuki...

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0015
rows.name: Where would you like to go next?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0016
rows.name: You really like adventures, don't you?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0017
rows.name: Hey, Ibuki...

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0018
rows.name: Where'd you wanna to go next?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0019
rows.name: You really like adventures, huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0020
rows.name: Ibuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0021
rows.name: What would you like to see next?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0022
rows.name:
You have a penchant for adventures,
I see.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0023
rows.name: So, Ibuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0024
rows.name: Where'd you want to go next?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0025
rows.name:
You've got a wacky craving for
adventures, don't ya?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0101
rows.name: Let's see...

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0102
rows.name:
I'd love to visit somewhere
with lots of snow!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0103
rows.name: Snow... you say?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0104
rows.name:
Yeah!
I've never been anywhere snowy before.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0105
rows.name:
I bet it's all pure white
and absolutely gorgeous!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0106
rows.name:
But wait, didn't we visit Luxuria
just a little while ago?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0107
rows.name:
Huh? Luxuria?
Does that place have snow?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0108
rows.name: Oh no! Don't tell me...

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0109
rows.name:
Did you all go there
without telling Ibuki?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0110
rows.name: That's mean!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0111
rows.name:
We wouldn't hide anything from you.
Byakko must be mistaken.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0112
rows.name:
We'd never do something like that.
Byakko must be confused, don't you think?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0113
rows.name:
We would never abandon you, Ibuki.
Perhaps Byakko is mistaken?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0114
rows.name:
We'd never ditch ya, Ibuki!
Byakko's just confused, that's all.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0115
rows.name:
Huh? Oh... right.
Let's just say I was mistaken, shall we?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0116
rows.name:
Jeez, you guys!
You really had me worried there!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0117
rows.name:
When we go, Ibuki will definitely
be together with you!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0118
rows.name:
Oh, and another place I'd love to see
is somewhere so hot that the ground
burns and makes you jump around!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0119
rows.name:
That way, I might be able to
fly freely through the sky too!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0120
rows.name: I doubt that would happen.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0121
rows.name:
Anyway!
Whenever we go anywhere, Ibuki will
definitely tag along!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0201
rows.name: Absolutely! I love adventures!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0202
rows.name:
There are always new things to discover,
and it's just so incredibly exciting...

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0203
rows.name:
...Wait, didn't I say
something similar just a moment ago?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0204
rows.name: ...Right?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0205
rows.name:
...Oh well, nevermind!
I must be imagining things!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0206
rows.name:
...Hahaha, you certainly seem to enjoy
yourself. That's so typical of you,
Ibuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0207
rows.name:
Huh? What do you mean?
Don't you all get excited
about new discoveries too?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0208
rows.name:
No no, I feel the same way you do.
Making new discoveries is thrilling!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0209
rows.name:
But I think you probably
enjoy it way more intensely
than the rest of us do.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0210
rows.name:
Nah, I mean, this stuff is
still kinda cool, Ibuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0211
rows.name:
We just don't go nuts and flip a lid
every time.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0212
rows.name:
No, seeing new things builds character,
I can't deny that.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0213
rows.name:
However, I believe Ibuki
experiences far greater enjoyment
than the rest of us.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0214
rows.name:
Don't get me wrong, Ibuki, it's good to
see something new.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0215
rows.name:
But some of us have super-cool,
ice-man reps to maintain.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0216
rows.name: Is that so?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0217
rows.name: Absolutely, Ibuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0218
rows.name:
Your way of enjoying things
is uniquely your own.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0219
rows.name:
Hmm, you're strange.
I don't get what you mean at all.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0301
rows.name:
...Anyway,
let's head off to new territories
in search of our next discovery!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0302
rows.name: Is everyone ready to go?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0303
rows.name:
Yes, yes.
I shall accompany you, of course.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0304
rows.name: Yeah! Woohoo!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0305
rows.name: Look! Lookit!aLook! Look at this!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0306
rows.name:
This view
is absolutely breathtaking!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0307
rows.name: Huh?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0308
rows.name:
Come on, take a look, Nyakko!
It's amazing!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0309
rows.name:
Umm, actually...
...have you already forgotten?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0310
rows.name:
Huh?
What exactly?

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0311
rows.name: Hahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0312
rows.name:
You really are fun to be around, Ibuki!
You never get boring!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0313
rows.name: Hahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0314
rows.name:
We'll never be short of entertainment
with you around, Ibuki.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0315
rows.name: Hahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0316
rows.name:
One truly never gets bored
with Ibuki around.

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0317
rows.name: Hahaha!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0318
rows.name: Ye really are a riot to be around, Ibuki!

rows.label: kizunatalk077_msg0319
rows.name:
What's with you guys?
You're all such weird Drivers...
